articles.author: RTÉ News
articles.title: HSE expects surge in coronavirus tests
articles.description: The Chief Operations Officer of the HSE has said there will be a "significant" surge in the number of people to be tested for Covid-19 over the coming week.
articles.content:
The Chief Operations Officer of the HSE has said there will be a "significant" surge in the number of people to be tested for Covid-19 over the coming week.

articles.author: RTÉ Sport
articles.title: Super Rugby season suspended due to coronavirus
articles.description: Super Rugby has been put on hold in the wake of New Zealand announcing that travellers entering the country must self-isolate for 14 days due to fears over the coronavirus outbreak.
articles.content:
Super Rugby has been put on hold in the wake of New Zealand announcing that travellers entering the country must self-isolate for 14 days due to fears over the coronavirus outbreak.
